open.title: Frogfoot Outage | Vincent, East London
open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Vincent, East London, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel outage | Cape Town
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Cape Town, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
Vumatel has confirm that the following areas are being affected by the outage:

Tableview North
Tableview South
Tygerdal
Summergreens
Bothasig
Richmond Estate
Parow North
Edgemead
Panorama
